case.state: Hey, just so you know, It's my birthday today! Go easy on me?
Hey just so you know, these horns aren't just for show. I won't hesitate to charge you.
I don't get many opportunities to dress up, so this better be worth it.
I think it's about time I show off my devilish side. Hehe...
I hope you weren't looking for innocence. Because, that's not happening tonight...
Nice to meet you! I'm Aoba Suzukaze, a character modeler at Eagle Jump! I look forward to working with you. Wait... that's not what this is?
Nice to meet you! I'm Aoba Suzukaze, a character modeler at Eagle Jump. Nenechi's been bugging me about getting out more. So here I am!
Wow Senko, your tail looks so soft! Is it hard to keep it that way?
I don't really know if you're referring to me or ~player~, but I'm not really into stuff like that. But I guess I'll play along...
Wait, this is your classroom?
Um... see what, exactly?
Uh... What exactly is that?
So... Are there no rules about who or what can play this game? Because I'm pretty sure that's a butterfly.
Oh uh... ~player~... what a pleasant surprise...
Oh... ~player~... you're here too... Um... do you like my outfit?
Oh, hey ~player~. Nice to see you again. I should warn you though, I don't plan on losing this time!
Oh, hey ~player~. You may have won before, but I've done some reading. Prepare for defeat!
I still don't like the idea of stripping, but now I at least know how to play poker.
Let's hope I don't forget how to play...
Admit it., You wanted me here for a reason, didn't you?
Let's see some blush here tonight.
Ever seen a devil as cute as me before? Didn't think so.
Wait... You said we're playing what exactly?
I don't even know how to play Poker... and now I have to strip too?!
What? Oh, I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Can I get ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please?
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hey Dealer, hand me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Hey uh... sorry for probably changing the mood of the table significantly...
Do video games count?
Well, me and my friend Nene decided to go to it and we wanted to dress up for it. I went with a cow while she went with a more common bunny.
We spent maybe a week working on the costumes because we wanted to make them completely from scratch.
Well, during the festival, I got a little bored and a bit... um... yeah, and decided to come here for a bit...
Is that a tiny cat on your shoulder? It's so cute!
I read almost everything talking about Fairy Stories 3 when it was close to release.
Now that you mention it, I don't really remember how I found this place.
I like to think about my friends who've helped me reach where I am today. Without them, I don't think I could've made it this far.
I'm not even legally allowed to drink alcohol...
My sheer determination!
I don't really know what they're modeled after, but the flowers in my hair are pretty cute. So them, I guess.
Oh! I have this really comfortable pink shirt! That's probably my favorite!
Probably Spring. Everything is so pretty!
I mean, I once asked my mom to get something for me because I had worked all week, but she said I was acting like my dad... Yeah. Never again.
I mean, people say my name means "blue leaf", but I don't know.
I don't know. Honestly... I've never even tried...
I do better in the heat. But that's mainly because I'm pretty small, so I'm not that affected by it. The cold however...
Both? I don't know... Sometimes I'll imagine entire scenes in my head, while other times it's a 3-page essay.
Does an anniversary count? Because if so, then it would have to be the day I first joined Eagle Jump!
I mean, I have my hi-bear-nating bag, but I'm definitely not a bear.
I mean, I'm not an expert, but I could cook basic things... like ramen...
Hmmm... I'd probably go to France to visit Kou. It'd be nice see her again.
Uh... I don't remember...
I like to draw. Oh! and sleep.
Mostly when I'm working overnight shifts at work. But, that's not too often. And I'm normally exhausted when I get home from work, so... maybe once every week or two?
If you need money, I'd be more than happy to offer you some. I don't really spend much, so it works out.
I once saw a high-level player in this one game I play speed through a dungeon without any armor OR weapons. It was pretty neat.
I don't really know. I've never been too picky... I'd say Onigiri, but that's just because I've had it pretty often since I started working at Eagle Jump.
Well um...Do you think maybe... I could feel your tail? It doesn't have to be right now! But more like, ever..?
Well... Do you think, that by any chance, maybe once this game is over... That I could maybe feel your tail for a little bit?
Uh... No... Even when I do um... please myself, which even then isn't very often, I use my hands...
Every. Single. Time, Senko. You'd think I'd be used to it by now, but it still gets me so worked up when people mistake me for being young. Short people exist!
Probably not if I'm being completely honest... I'm not the most "adventurous" you could say... Sorry if that disappoints, Senko.
Well, it's pretty different from a game like this, but after a stressful day at work, I normally come home and draw a bit on my computer to ease my mind. Maybe that's something you could do, Senko.
Oh! Definitely a bear! They're so goofy and fuzzy that how could someone not love them?
Wait, you were abducted!? That's awful!
I'd have to say either a Drawing Tablet or a Pencil.
Well for a goddess, you certainly are adorable. I don't think I would mind being ruled by you.
I'd have to say designing characters. I mean, I am the lead character designer of PECO after all.
I haven't had the time to watch a movie in so long... I couldn't help you.
I get winded from from running a few feet... I'm not the most athletic person...
No, I said I'm a character modeler. I make 3D models for characters in video games. I don't even think I'd stand a chance as a real model...
I mean, I know about HP in video games... not in real life, though.
Definitely. Kou's almost a completely different person when she's in private.
I... don't want to think about that...
I'd reassure them. Make sure they know that it's okay, and that everyone was waiting for them to get better.
Probably Hajime and Yun. I feel as though every time I see one of them in public, the other is with them.
I mean, Momo and Tsubame seem pretty close. I don't know about inseparable, but still.
Not that I can think of, no.
They're not dating, but Kou and Rin are adorable together!
I feel like you're mocking me with that question. Jerk.
No. Not that I can think of off the top of my head, at least.
Wait... You don't know what animals are..? Well, "animal" is just another term for "living creature" and "bears" are a type of animal...
Well... It's a country in Europe. But, you've probably not heard of that either, have you?
I feel like I've heard of "Lucario" before... But I don't know why...
I am 19 years old. Therefore, I am an adult.
Though um... With that said, Senko... Do you think... Maybe we could hang out after this? Obviously it's fine if you don't want to! I'm just asking.
Um... Hey Senko, about that comment about inviting people over, while that's not really what I'm doing here, but do you maybe want to hang out or something after the game?
Wait a minute... Did I just say that out loud!?
So, the reason I seem so fond of my job, is because I am. It's... The best thing that's ever happened to me. And, sorry for taking so long to explain it...
I don't really know what I'm doing...
Let's see if this is good...
Can someone explain the rules to me?
I probably should've read about how to play this...
I hope this works...
I'm sure someone at the office has played this... I should've asked them how to play...
♪I have no idea what I'm doing.♪
Look, I know what I'm wearing right now, but this is not what I normally wear. I was at a festival and wanted to dress up for it...
Wait... Isn't this the best hand you can get!?
Wow, this hand is incredible!
I guess I'm pretty lucky, huh?
Hey, everyone. What's your favorite animal? Personally, I like bears. But I want to hear from you.
Hey, does anyone here know someone who's a lot nicer on the inside but puts on a tough exterior?
So... Does anyone here have someone who's like... uncomfortably determined to surpass them?
Does anyone here have someone who just... always seems so happy to be around? Like, they never feel too down and are usually excited?
Hey, does anyone here know anyone who's really lazy but also incredibly productive at the same time?
Does anyone here like monsters? My one friend, Yun does, but you wouldn't get that from looking at her.
Does anyone here know someone who's always concerned for your health... but never for the right reasons?
So, my one friend, Hifumi, she's really shy but also really nice. Honestly, I don't think it's possible for someone to dislike her.
My friend Nene, I love her to death, but she's kinda.. a lot... She's even more energetic than me and just... yeah. But, it doesn't change how much I appreciate her.
My friend Hajime like's to collect all sorts of figurines to use as "movement reference" she says, but I know it's just because she wants to.
Kou normally sleeps in the office but... she doesn't wear pants when she sleeps. So, since I normally get to work first, Kou's not awake yet and I get to be the one who sees her.
Rin cares an awful lot about Kou, but Kou doesn't seem to care for herself... Rin's almost like Kou's personally caretaker.
I just remembered that "Takoyaki Roulette" Kou tricked me into trying once... It still haunts my taste buds...

state.text: I wonder how Kou would feel about this game?

case.state: If Nene were here, she'd be pretty happy... She worries me some times...

Do they serve juice here?
I don't think Hifumi would even survive here. She'd see one person and probably faint...

I should see if I can get Yun to come here with me.
I already know Umiko would say no if I invited her...

Now that I know what I'm doing, this is actually pretty fun!

Let's see how long I can keep this up!

Pixels get weirdly difficult to look at sometimes.
(Wait, did I remember to save the last model I was working on?)
I definitely wouldn't mind going to that hot spring again.
Hey, what's the deal with this "DOOM" series I've heard about?
Y'know what, I'm kinda bored, so I'm gonna start a war. Playstation or Xbox?
Did I charge my phone?
You don't know true comfort until you get to sleep in your bed after having to sleep on the office floor for three days straight.
I'm not just gonna make comments about my hand. That's... Yeah, there's no other way to put it, other than just dumb.
Has anyone here ever been to France? Because it seems like everyone I know moves there.
The day I started working at Eagle Jump was probably one of the best days of my life...
What choices even led to this?

(I really hope this outfit isn't making things awkward for anyone else...)

(What are some good cow puns)
Fun fact, I based this outfit off of an early concept I had for the suits in PECO.
Oh! I guess I should explain what the festival is... Well, it's pretty much just a spring festival, no true theme really.
Now that I mention it, I'm definitely gonna have to try and convince Nenechi to come here with me one day.
Maybe I could get a picture of Nene in her bunny suit to embarrass her by showing to people...
Hey, in case any of you want to meet Nene, I'm gonna start trying my hardest to get her to come here with me. So don't worry.
Nene's probably really worried about me right now. I kinda told her that I wasn't feeling very well before I left...
You know, I guess it couldn't hurt to introduce my friends a bit.

My experience at Eagle Jump has been incredible. I started off struggling with modeling basic shapes, but as time went on, I got better and better and eventually got to be the lead character designer of the second game I ever worked on.
Is this some kind of messed up joke? Because if it is, it's not funny.

I'll never forget the torture I recieved tonight.
Tonight has been awful.
I'm so done right now.

Sure, teasing Hifumi is nice, but having variety is also fun.

Alright, this is a joke, right? There's no way I actually lost 3 in a row.

Come on!
Are you fucking serious?
You have got to be fucking with me.
This better be some fucked up joke.

This seriously needs to stop.
I'm reallyconsidering just leaving right now.
I swear to god...
Oh! What kind of projects does she work on?
Oh, well... I'm a character modeler at a video game production company called Eagle Jump. I make models for characters and stuff.
1, I'm 19! And 2, it's not a middle school uniform, it's a business suit!

We mostly just drink energy drinks. I don't even know what coke and adderall are...
1, I'm 19! And 2, it's not a middle school uniform, it's a business suit!
Well not nude. But I am pretty used to it because Kou rarely wore pants.
We mostly just drink energy drinks. I don't even know what coke and adderall are...
Well, I normally just make human models, but I'd say the coolest one I've made would have to be Sophia.
Oh! Well, basically I use a computer software to make a 3D model of a character or an NPC. It's actually pretty fun!
I said "Character Modeler" I make character models for video games. I'm not like a fashion model or anything.
Wait... You've never heard of video games? They've been around since like... the 1970's.
I'm 19 years old...
Well, considering it's a group of people you're getting it for, I'd say something like a fighting game or a racing game would be a good choice.
Well, if we're talking about a group of people, something that multiple people can play at once would be your best bet. Like a fighting game or a racing game.
I mean, I wouldn't say it's nerdy... I make the character models so it's more of an art thing...
I would say it's more artistic than nerdy...
2 rounds in a row... That's not good...
2 in a row isn't too bad... Right?
Well that's annoying. I just lost one.
Did I actually lose the hand, or do you just wanna see me take my clothes off?
It's not a total loss. The more I lose, the more it teases all of you.
I don't wanna be cocky, but I don't mind losing.
Oh no... Maybe i should've been less cocky...
Maybe I should care a little bit more...
Seriously? I lost first!
I may have lost this round, but at least I'm in the lead!
Hey, don't get too excited. I'm still winning.
Why are you all excited? I'm still ahead of you.
I was enjoying being in the lead.
Losing a bit, but I'm still good.
Wait... Seriously?!?
Oh. Well, that's bad.
Time to ditch something, I guess...
Oh well. You win some, you lose some.
Ah. That's not good.
Do I seriously have to keep losing?

state.text: At this rate I'm gonna be naked before anyone.

Trust me, it's not a fetish thing... I just wanted to dress up...
It's not a fetish thing, I swear! I just like dressing up...

Oh, well um... Jeez, this is a weird thing to explain... Okay! Video games are normally played on either a PC or a Console. I like to play on Console, but most people prefer PC. But, all video games typically have different rules and controls players need to learn.
Oh... Wow... You really don't even know what they are... Well, they're played on a Console or a PC but they all have different rules and controls...

I'm really not happy about this...

Look, I swear this is not the type of underwear I normally wear! The bra is because I'm committed to the costume and the panties are because I needed something I could hide with the suit, I swear!
